description: Try our easy to follow Salmon with Tartar Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Salmon with Tartar Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 small red chillies, seeds removed, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Scoop seeds from tomatoes and discard.
Chop tomato flesh and combine in a bowl with shallots and herbs. Mix lemon juice with spices and season with salt and pepper.
Pour over salad and set aside while you prepare the sauce.
Soak the bread in the lemon juice.
Place pine nuts, garlic and bread into a small food processor and process until chopped. With the motor running, slowly add oil and process until it is thick and creamy, transfer to bowl.
Heat a non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat.
Brush both sides of the salmon with a little oil. Place into pan, skin side down and cook for 4 minutes. Reduce heat to medium, turn fish and cook for a further 4 minutes.
Transfer to serving plates and serve with tomato salad and a drizzle of tartare sauce.
